summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Two Thousand Six Hundred Twenty-three and 56/100 ($2,623.56) Dollars, from the General Fund, or so much thereof as may be necessary, to pay the City's portion of the cost of the improvement of Twenty-first Avenue, and East Olive Street, by paving, as provided for in Ordinance No. 15537, creating Local Improvement District No. 1441.
